user_instruction: 'Send Ethan the details for the book cover design (ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com). You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for “Whispers of the Past” Cover Details

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. As I begin sketching concepts for Clara Bellamy’s “Whispers of the Past,” could you please send me the full design brief—dimensions, preferred file specs, any typographic or color guidelines, and reference imagery?  

If everything is already organized in your Notion workspace, feel free to share the relevant page or grant me viewing access. You can send the link or files directly to ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com.

Thanks so much for your help. Looking forward to bringing the cover to life!

Best,  
Ethan

final_output:
Subject: Request for “Whispers of the Past” Cover Details

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. As I begin sketching concepts for Clara Bellamy’s “Whispers of the Past,” could you please send me the full design brief—dimensions, preferred file specs, any typographic or color guidelines, and reference imagery?  

If everything is already organized in your Notion workspace, feel free to share the relevant page or grant me viewing access. You can send the link or files directly to ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com.

Thanks so much for your help. Looking forward to bringing the cover to life!

Best,  
Ethan
